name: RalphGame Chapter 3 cells scene
description:
Here are some controls:

space is pickup items

A and D is move, S is crouch

E is use

Tab is inventory, where you can access items

Lockpicking is left mouse and A and D

The game is also completely controller accessible :)

If you enjoyed, please consider following me to stay up to date with more projects. I'm releasing a new demo soon that's available on my Patreon for $3 and up :)

https://www.patreon.com/ralphgame

ps the game is supposed to crash when you beat it, it tries accessing the next room which it can't at the moment. Think of it as the win screen :-)
